      Association Solutions
     </a>
     <div class="wide-box-holder">

       </h2>

   <section class="section -colored section-gallery-navigation">
    <div class="frame">
     <h2 class="title-section">
      <span>
       SERVICES
      </span>
     </h2>
    </div>
    <div class="frame">
     <div class="frame">
      <div class="slider slider-nav ">
       <div>
        Creative
       </div>
       <div>
        Destination Management
       </div>
       <div>
        Production &amp; Audio Visual
       </div>
       <div>
        Digital
       </div>
       <div>
        Content
       </div>
       <div>
        Analytics
       </div>
       <div>
        Sustainability
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="slider slider-for ">
     <div>
      <div class="slide-columns">
       <div class="left-content">
        <div class="content-holder">
         <h2 class="title">
          Creative
         </h2>
         <h3 class="sub-title">
          Powerful communications for your live experiences
         </h3>
         <p>
          Together we will turn your messages into compelling stories that engage attendees and members.
         </p>
         <a class="btn" href="/services/creative">
          Learn more
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="right-content">
        <img alt="" src="/-/media/images/homepage/global/services/creative1.ashx?h=550&amp;w=920&amp;la=en&amp;hash=4259A8704E1B5CBEC7B3073ED31769108D41A837"/>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div>
      <div class="slide-columns">
       <div class="left-content">
        <div class="content-holder">
         <h2 class="title">
          Destination Management
         </h2>
         <h3 class="sub-title">
          Designing and executing your objectives from logistics to exclusive high-end programmes
         </h3>
         <p>
          We put our local knowledge and global expertise into practice to provide you with tailored destination management solutions.
         </p>
         <a class="btn" href="/services/destination-management" title="MCI destination management company">
          Learn more
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="right-content">
        <img alt="Destination management solution and services" src="/-/media/images/homepage/global/services/destination-management.ashx?h=550&amp;w=920&amp;la=en&amp;hash=CB5240C785B0AE23D28609974265F10D35CDD26E"/>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div>
      <div class="slide-columns">
       <div class="left-content">
        <div class="content-holder">
         <h2 class="title">
          Production &amp; Audio Visual
         </h2>
         <h3 class="sub-title">
          Maximise the impact of your message
         </h3>
         <p>
          Whether you are seeking to enhance the experience for your attendees, stimulate discussions among delegates, or even create slick hybrid experiences, together we will find the right formula of tailored AV &amp; technical solutions.
         </p>
         <a class="btn" href="/services/production-and-audio-visual">
          Learn more
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="right-content">
        <img alt="" src="/-/media/images/homepage/global/services/production.ashx?h=550&amp;w=920&amp;la=en&amp;hash=5152712A5B26EBEB5080C7FA2BF512249DAC60A4"/>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div>
      <div class="slide-columns">
       <div class="left-content">
        <div class="content-holder">
         <h2 class="title">
          Digital
         </h2>
         <h3 class="sub-title">
          Engage members and attendees. Extend the reach of your message.
         </h3>
         <p>
          Turn every event into a powerful platform using our hybrid event technology, webcasting and streaming solutions.
         </p>
         <a class="btn" href="/services/digital">
          Learn more
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="right-content">
        <img alt="" src="/-/media/images/homepage/global/services/digital.ashx?h=550&amp;w=920&amp;la=en&amp;hash=DA2F5B7A328BD509C1E40FEB4C91834ACC928E37"/>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div>
      <div class="slide-columns">
       <div class="left-content">
        <div class="content-holder">
         <h2 class="title">
          Content
         </h2>
         <h3 class="sub-title">
          Spread the knowledge and increase your event’s life cycle
         </h3>
         <p>
          We help you create and distribute content based on human insights that aims to drive impact, stimulate discussions, spread knowledge and evoke emotional retention.
         </p>
         <a class="btn" href="/services/content">
          Learn more
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="right-content">
        <img alt="" src="/-/media/images/homepage/global/services/content.ashx?h=550&amp;w=920&amp;la=en&amp;hash=EE2DBC854C7D50964605C339FE6333BF031E4FD8"/>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div>
      <div class="slide-columns">
       <div class="left-content">
        <div class="content-holder">
         <h2 class="title">
          Analytics
         </h2>
         <h3 class="sub-title">
          Meaningful insights for maximum impact
         </h3>
         <p>
          Upgrade your live event marketing programmes using our unique data management strategies and tools that are flexible, agile and allow for real-time interactions.
         </p>
         <a class="btn" href="/services/analytics">
          Learn more
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="right-content">
        <img alt="" src="/-/media/images/homepage/global/services/data-and-analytics.ashx?h=550&amp;w=920&amp;la=en&amp;hash=39359C4768D80CCB4EF3AB0863E5716DAEEF3279"/>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div>
      <div class="slide-columns">
       <div class="left-content">
        <div class="content-holder">
         <h2 class="title">
          Sustainability
         </h2>
         <h3 class="sub-title">
          Delivering sustainable solutions to enhance performance
         </h3>
         <p>
          From improving the carbon and social footprint of your event, to the integration of sustainable event management solutions, MCI’s sustainable solutions support you to deliver social, environmental and economic value to your stakeholders.
         </p>
         <a class="btn" href="/services/sustainability">
          Learn more
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="right-content">
        <img alt="" src="/-/media/images/homepage/global/services/sustainability.ashx?h=550&amp;w=920&amp;la=en&amp;hash=4676100B70C77629BB00D0ECC227FCEFB1498C16"/>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </section>
   <section class="section section-multiple-items-gallery">
    <div class="frame">
     <h2 class="title-section">
      <span>
       Our Work
      </span>
     </h2>
    </div>
    <div class="multiple-items-gallery">
     <div class="gallery-item" style="background-image:url(/-/media/images/work-and-insights/work/global/teaserhp-cs39.ashx);">
      <a href="/work/global/engaging-hackers-with-perfect-brand-experience">
       <div class="gallery-item-content">

        </h3>

        </div>
       </div>
      </a>
     </div>
     <div class="gallery-item" style="background-image:url(/-/media/images/work-and-insights/work/global/teaserhp-cs40.ashx);">
      <a href="/work/global/inspiring-key-decision-makers-for-tomorrows-reality">

        </div>
       </div>
      </a>
     </div>
     <div class="gallery-item" style="background-image:url(/-/media/images/work-and-insights/work/global/teaserhp-cs67.ashx);">
      <a href="/work/global/testing-and-learning-about-digital-mobility-solutions">

     </div>
     <div class="gallery-item" style="background-image:url(/-/media/images/work-and-insights/work/global/banner-esmo.ashx);">

        <h3 class="title">

        </h3>
        <div class="text">

         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </a>
     </div>
     <div class="gallery-item" style="background-image:url(/-/media/images/work-and-insights/work/global/teaserhp-cs41.ashx);">
      <a href="/work/global/launching-next-level-product-in-style">
       <div class="gallery-item-content">
        <h3 class="title">
         Launching Next-Level Product in Style
        </h3>
        <div class="text">
         <p>
          Windows Hands-On Tablet Launch Roadshow - Microsoft
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </a>
     </div>
     <div class="gallery-item" style="background-image:url(/-/media/images/work-and-insights/work/global/figo-big---filtred.ashx);">
      <a href="/work/global/utilising-strategies-to-boost-abstracts-submission">

   <section class="section -colored section-collage">
    <div class="frame">
     <h2 class="title-section">
      <span>
       news &amp; Insights
      </span>
     </h2>
     <div class="collage">
      <div class="big-image" style="background-image: url(/-/media/images/work-and-insights/insights/global/sust-teaser.ashx);">
       <a class="overlapping-link" href="/media-centre/press-releases/2018/2017-sustainability-report">
        MCI releases 2017 sustainability report
       </a>
       <div class="text-block">
        <h3 class="title">
         MCI releases 2017 sustainability report
        </h3>
        <div class="text">
         <p>
          Geneva, June 27th 2018. MCI is pleased to announce the launch of its 2017 Sustainability Report titled “Fostering Care &amp; Generating Value”.
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="several-images">
